message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I think that's as low as I can go.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $10200?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, but I still need to make a decent profit. I can do $11500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $10800?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $12500, but I'm not sure how much further I can go.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $11000?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $13000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my previous offer. Can you consider $12500?
